snippet: John Casesa, most recently the head of automotive investment banking at Guggenheim Partners, will help oversee Ford’s business strategy, potentially including acquisitions and other partnerships.
abstract: John Casesa, most recently the head of automotive investment banking at Guggenheim Partners, will help oversee Ford’s business strategy, potentially including acquisitions and other partnerships.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Ford Hires Wall St. Banker to Lead Global Strategy
